org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface RoleAPI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IdentityAPI, IdentityAPI

    public interface RoleAPI
    RoleAPI forms part of the OrganizationAPI and gives access to all the Administration operations available on Roles: creation, deletion, search, etc...
    Author:
    Feng Hui, Matthieu Chaffotte, Hongwen Zang, Emmanuel Duchastenier
    See Also:
    SearchResult for general knowledege on Search mechanism in Bonita BPM., Role

    • Method Detail

      • createRole

        Role createRole(String roleName)
                throws AlreadyExistsException,
                       CreationException
        Creates a role.
        Parameters:
        roleName - the name of the role
        Returns:
        the created role
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - If the name is already taken by an existing role
        CreationException - If an exception occurs during the role creation
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • createRole

        Role createRole(RoleCreator creator)
                throws AlreadyExistsException,
                       CreationException
        Create the role.

        It takes the values of the creator in order to create the role.

        Parameters:
        creator - the role creator
        Returns:
        the created role.
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - If the name is already taken by an existing role
        CreationException - If an exception occurs during the role creation
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • updateRole

        Role updateRole(long roleId,
              RoleUpdater updater)
                throws RoleNotFoundException,
                       UpdateException
        Updates the group according to the updater values.
        Parameters:
        roleId - the identifier of the role
        updater - the role updater
        Returns:
        the updated role
        Throws:
        RoleNotFoundException - If the role identifier does not refer to an existing role
        UpdateException - If an exception occurs during the role update
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • deleteRole

        void deleteRole(long roleId)
                throws DeletionException
        Deletes the role.
        Parameters:
        roleId - the role identifier
        Throws:
        DeletionException - If an exception occurs during the role deletion
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • deleteRoles

        void deleteRoles(List<Long> roleIds)
                 throws DeletionException
        Deletes the roles.
        Parameters:
        roleIds - the list of role identifiers
        Throws:
        DeletionException - If an exception occurs during the role deletion
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getRole

        Role getRole(long roleId)
             throws RoleNotFoundException
        Retrieves the role.
        Parameters:
        roleId - the identifier of the role
        Returns:
        the role
        Throws:
        RoleNotFoundException - If the role identifier does not refer to an existing role
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getRoleByName

        Role getRoleByName(String roleName)
                   throws RoleNotFoundException
        Retrieves the role.
        Parameters:
        roleName - the name of the role.
        Returns:
        the role.
        Throws:
        RoleNotFoundException - If the role name does not refer to an existing role
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getNumberOfRoles

        long getNumberOfRoles()
        Returns the total number of roles.
        Returns:
        the total number of roles
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the count retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getRoles

        List<Role> getRoles(int startIndex,
                  int maxResults,
                  RoleCriterion criterion)
        Retrieves the paginated list of roles.

        It retrieves from the startIndex to the startIndex + maxResults.

        Parameters:
        startIndex - the start index
        maxResults - the max number of roles
        criterion - the sorting criterion
        Returns:
        the paginated list of roles
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getRoles

        Map<Long,Role> getRoles(List<Long> roleIds)
        Retrieves the roles. The map contains the couples roleId/Role.

        If a role does not exists, no exception is thrown and no value is added in the map.

        Parameters:
        roleIds - the identifiers of the roles
        Returns:
        the roles
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • searchRoles

        SearchResult<Role> searchRoles(SearchOptions options)
                               throws SearchException
        Searches roles according to the criteria containing in the options.
        Parameters:
        options - the search criteria
        Returns:
        the search result
        Throws:
        SearchException - If an exception occurs during the role searching
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0
